public class HiLoBar
extends Bar

HiLoBar(Dataset[], AxisInterface, AxisInterface, Plotarea)

doBar(Graphics, double, int, int, boolean)
overrides Bar to draw bars that consider both Y and Y2
doBarLabel(Graphics, double, int, int)
Overrides Bar to draw labels on HiLo bars
doDBar(Graphics, double, int, int, boolean)
Overrides Bar to draw dimensional bars that consider both Y and Y2 values

HiLoBar 
  public HiLoBar(Dataset d[],
                 AxisInterface xAx,
                 AxisInterface yAx,
                 Plotarea subplot)
Parameters:
d - Array of Dataset classes to use
xAx - X Axis scaling this data
yAx - Y Axis scaling this data
subplot - Plotarea containing this chart element
